title: 3D Deeplabcut problem
body:
**Operation Systems** Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & deeplabcut 2.1.8.2 **Describe the problem** Hello my name is Alberto Moreno, today ,i request your help with a problem that i will describe. Problem: In this moment i am working with 3D DeepLabCut, so i followed the instructions (https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/a3ff917fc04ae0199b051b1d0cc2f75c3700191a/docs/Overviewof3D.md ) ,everything was going fine until, i run the next command: deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras(config_path3d,cbrow=8,cbcol=6,calibrate=False,alpha=0.4) Then terminal shows me the next error: **Code OUTPUT**
FileNotFoundError Traceback (most recent call last) in ----> 1 deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras(config_path3d, cbrow=8, cbcol=6, calibrate=True, alpha=0.9) ~/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_3d/camera_calibration.py in calibrate_cameras(config, cbrow, cbcol, calibrate, alpha) 73 74 # Read the config file ---> 75 cfg_3d = auxiliaryfunctions.read_config(config) 76 img_path,path_corners,path_camera_matrix,path_undistort=auxiliaryfunctions_3d.Foldernames3Dproject(cfg_3d) 77 ~/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/utils/auxiliaryfunctions.py in read_config(configname) 130 else: 131 raise FileNotFoundError( --> 132 "Config file is not found. Please make sure that the file exists and/or that you passed the path of the config file correctly!") 133 return (cfg) 134 FileNotFoundError: Config file is not found. Please make sure that the file exists and/or that you passed the path of the config file correctly!

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: In [1]: import deeplabcut In [2]: import os In [3]: from pathlib import Path In [5]: config_path3d=os.path.join(os.getcwd(),'Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml') **Screenshots** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68699532/92021088-d2396500-ed1e-11ea-9dda-ff66dbedd902.png) **Additional context** In the picture we can appreciate which commands i used, but i did not find the mistake , please somebody could help me?
